text: Men's rights movement is a movement where men try to improve the lives of men. They focus on many topics such as adoption, male suicide and male homelessness.Stemple, Lara. "Male rape and human rights." Hastings LJ 60 (2008): 605. These movements started showing up in the 1970s. Some of these movements approve of feminism, other movements are against it. == Related pages == * Gender equality * Human rights * Women's rights * International Men's Day == References == Category:Men
title: Men's rights movement
